org.apache.lucene.codecs.blockterms

Class TermsIndexWriterBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.codecs.blockterms.TermsIndexWriterBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FixedGapTermsIndexWriter, VariableGapTermsIndexWriter

    public abstract class TermsIndexWriterBase
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Base class for terms index implementations to plug into BlockTermsWriter.
    See Also:
    TermsIndexReaderBase
    WARNING: This API is experimental and might change in incompatible ways in the next release.
